comments.body:
Minor:
Why not directly construct a `resultDF`(only includes 2 column "pValue", "featureIndex") to test `selectIndicesFromPValues` ? This can simplify tests code.

Don't need to block merge.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +640,644 @@      .setLabelType("continuous")
    val indices1 = selector.selectIndicesFromPValues(6, resultDF1, "fdr", 0.1)
    val indices2 = selector.selectIndicesFromPValues(6, resultDF2, "fdr", 0.1)
    assert(indices1(0) === 1 && indices1(1) === 0)
    assert(indices2(0) === 0)
